m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Anchors Aweigh: $26 Oil As Your New Starting Point Monday, February 8, 2016             Comments John Richardson Follow @OilVoice Follow @OilVoice   IF not these six months then it will be the second half of this year and if not H2 then definitely, without a doubt, sometime in 2017. So goes the constantly shifting thinking of some oil, gas and chemicals companies, and some of the independent analysts, on when oil markets will rebalance to 'rational price levels'. They may no longer define rational as $100/bbl, but they still see prices recovering to above $50/b
